question: Harihara II ruled the Sangama dynasty during which of the following period?
explanation: Harihara II became the ruler of the Sangama dynasty after the death of Bukka Raya I in 1377. He ruled the Sangama dynasty from 1377 CE to 1404 CE. He earned the titles Vaidikamarga Sthapanacharya and Vedamarga Pravartaka.
